channel.title: CentOS Vps Put files on it
channel.description:
[code]i just bought a linux vps from x10vps.com and it has CentOS 5.5. how can I put my Project insanity files on there and run them? my batch run file says
[code=]@echo off title FreshScape "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_23\bin\java.exe" -Xmx5120m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause[/code] I need to make this .sh or something to use it in the linux terminal. sorry for sloppy typing I typed this in like 15 seconds

item.title: CentOS Vps Put files on it
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:

Questions pertaining to VPS’s go here.

item.title: CentOS Vps Put files on it
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Mill:

Well I’m buying one from x10vps.com, and I have no clue what to do after that. How do I get on it or something like that? I am new to VPS guys

I’d suggest SSH to your server. From there you can do anything you need.

Read full topic

item.title: CentOS Vps Put files on it
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Comments for VPS’s go here. And there’s been many questions like this, which the search bar could show you. So I’ve heard a lot of good feedback of

KickAssVps.com so I’d recommend that.

Read full topic
item.source: CentOS Vps Put files on it

item.title: CentOS Vps Put files on it
item.dc:creator: @Mill Mill
item.description:
@Mill wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:5, topic:398720”][quote author=Mill link=topic=495858.msg3625146#msg3625146 date=1307773987]

Use kickassvps.com, cheaper and better.

I also asked how I could make it work. I don’t know terminal.
[/quote]

“terminal” isn’t a programming language. It’s simply a shell that allows you to interact with the kernel. It’s the equivalent of windows “CMD Prompt”.[/quote]
Yeah I know that sounded different than what I meant. I meant I don’t know anything about Linux’s terminal.

Read full topic
item.source: CentOS Vps Put files on it

item.title: CentOS Vps Put files on it
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“Mill, post:3, topic:398720”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=495858.msg3625135#msg3625135 date=1307772305]
Use kickassvps.com, cheaper and better.
[/quote]
I also asked how I could make it work. I don’t know terminal.[/quote]

“terminal” isn’t a programming language. It’s simply a shell that allows you to interact with the kernel. It’s the equivalent of windows “CMD Prompt”.

Read full topic

@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

With windows VPS’s you can simply connect with remote desktop or what ever program the company provides too. It will look and run just like a normal windows computer.
